segments.text: I just called Mr . Smith in Room 201 , but there was no reply . Would you find out if he's still staying there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . One moment , please ... No , Mr . Smith checked out this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , he did ? May I have his forwarding address , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ' m afraid he didn â€™ t leave one .
segments.speaker: S2
